entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon then snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023
